name: Dishelfled
description:
"What do you MEAN the books are out of place?"

A bookstore employee, you and your coworkers are being plagued by your worst nightmare: books that don't seem to want to stay in their place on the shelves. What could possibly be happening?

A short but jam-packed visual novel for people new to the medium as both players and developers. 

Features:

  • customizable main character
  • 4 endings
  • platonic and romantic dialogue choices
  • two minigames
  • a special Behind the Scenes feature that let's you peek into the development process

Things to come:

  • more in depth breakdown of the  backend of development based on community feedback
  • raw PSD's  for the study of proper game asset creation
  • a breakdown of the narrative design and writing process
